title: Custom Destination Event Planning & Management - Phoenix | CSI DMC
text:
PHOENIX
Maureen Carter
Senior VP, Global Sales +1 719.491.2953 maureen.carter@csi-dmc.com
CSI dmc PHOENIX
Explore the dazzling Valley of the Sun in Phoenix, the capital city of Arizona. Surrounded by stunning mountain vistas, Phoenix provides the perfect backdrop for extraordinary events. Whether you love historic architecture, contemporary structures, or natural landscapes, this city contains an abundance of venues to fit groups of all sizes. tastes. During the day, enjoy custom tours, explore the world’s largest municipal park, experience the local arts scene, or learn something new during a specialized program at one of Phoenix’s museums. Indulge in premier Southwestern flavors, enjoy live entertainment, or dance the night away as part of the city’s vibrant nightlife. The city’s diverse attractions and culture make it an ideal location for special events and programs of all sizes and interests. Located near the heart of the city, Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) allows for quick and easy access to everything Phoenix offers with daily domestic and international flights.
